title: All 32 - Indianapolis Colts: Analyzing additions of Philip Rivers, DeForest Buckner and skill position draft picks with Stephen Holder (Football 6/17)
description:
Can the Colts seriously compete this season? Stephen Holder of The Athletic joins us for the latest conversation in our 'All 32' series, discussing all things Indianapolis with guest host Ryan Wilson. They discuss the addition of Philip Rivers (1:00), draft selections of Michael Pittman Jr. and Jonathan Taylor (3:00), the trade for DeForest Buckner (5:30) and expected position battles (9:45). Stephen also details the leadership of Frank Reich (12:00) and expectations for the team this year (16:00).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @ryanwilsonCBS, @HolderStephen
Subscribe to our Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
